des: "Popped sorghum is an earthy spin on popcorn. Sprinkle cinnamon and sugar onto the freshly popped sorghum for a sweet treat."
ins: Pour sorghum into a small brown paper bag and fold shut. Microwave on High until the majority of sorghum is popped,  1 to 1 1/2 minutes. Transfer popped sorghum into a bowl and drizzle with canola oil; sprinkle with sugar and cinnamon. Toss to coat.
